EmailTemplate.name: LE-202207-FM-REG-HEV.Phase 5 - Top Target Speaker Announcement Register Now
EmailTemplate.subject: C-suite speakers announced for Forum 2022
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Forum The Global Community Advancing Virtual Care
Boston + Virtual | July 20-22, 2022
FEATURED SPEAKERS We’re honored to welcome a roster of global leaders —including a special appearance from Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella—to Forum 2022. From clinical perspectives to innovative approaches and beyond (plus a healthy dose of inspiration), these are the voices shaping the future of virtual care. Register now <[[https://forum.teladochealth.com/registration?utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=top-target-5&utm_campaign=forum-22]]> to be part of the conversation!
David Rhew, MD Global Chief Medical Officer & Vice President of Healthcare Microsoft
Bechara Choucair, MD Senior Vice President & Chief Health Officer Kaiser Permanente
David Fletcher, MBA Associate Vice President of Telehealth Geisinger
SAVE YOUR SPOT Don’t miss your chance to engage with thousands of attendees from across the healthcare industry, hear success stories, and gain access to a worldwide community you can connect with throughout the year.
Register now <[[https://forum.teladochealth.com/registration?utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=top-target-5&utm_campaign=forum-22]]>
About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
